description:
'''Alt-J''' (stylised as '''alt-J''', real name '''Î”''') are an English [[indie rock]] band formed in 2007 in [[Leeds]]. Their lineup includes Joe Newman (guitar/lead vocals), [[Thom Sonny Green]] (drums), Gus Unger-Hamilton (keyboards/vocals), and formerly Gwil Sainsbury (guitar/bass).

Their debut album ''[[An Awesome Wave]]'' was released in May 2012 in Europe, and in September 2012 in the United States, and won the 2012 British [[Mercury Prize]]. Sainsbury left the band in early 2014. Their second album, ''[[This Is All Yours]]'', was released on 22 September 2014 and went straight to number one in the United Kingdom. In June 2017 the band released their third studio album ''[[Relaxer (album)|Relaxer]]'', followed in February 2022 by their fourth studio album ''[[The Dream (Alt-J album)|The Dream]]''.
